questions.text: Where did Sam say his old mattress was?
questions.explanation:
the Smithsonian.

	Sam had been with hundreds of women in the past. He claimed his old mattress was in the Smithsonian since he had slept with more women than most men.

questions.text: Whom did Frasier play in "The Mikado"?
questions.explanation:
Yum Yum.

	"The Mikado" was a operetta by Gilbert and Sullivan. Frasier and Simon starred in it together in college.

questions.text: Who started speaking with an English accent when Simon was around?
questions.explanation:
Diane.

	Diane was enamored with Simon and started to imitate his accent when he was around.  At one point her state, "He has helped hundred, nay thousands of marriages. It's even rumored that he had a hand in helping Chuck and Di." Carla responded to this by saying, "Speaking of which why don't you upchuck and die."

questions.text: What did Sam say was the most important thing in a marriage?
questions.explanation:
sex.

	Diane said the most important thing was love. Simon told them they were both wrong. Simon tells them honesty is the most important thing.

questions.text: Did Simon think Sam and Diane should get married?
questions.explanation:
no.

	He said not only should they not get married, they should not even see each other. Diane was very upset by this, where as Sam didn't care what Simon thought. He said, "No one we know thinks we should get married."

questions.text: What did Diane say she and Sam have achieved?
questions.explanation:
symbiosis.

	Symbiosis is a relationship that is beneficial to each party involved. Sam didn't know this and said, "Well not every time, but it was close."

questions.text: How long did Diane say it sometimes took Sam to come up with his first answer?
questions.explanation:
2 hours.

	Simon told them that their answers didn't matter since they had two hours to think about it, to which Diane said it sometimes took Sam 2 hours to come up with his first answer. Sam got annoyed because once again Diane was insulting his intelligence.

questions.text: After Diane and Sam went to Simon's hotel room several times, what did Simon do?
questions.correct: declare them to be the perfect couple
questions.explanation:
declare them to be the perfect couple.

	He announced out the window that people should stop getting married because the perfect marriage was about to be made. He recorded it as well saying he'd stake his life on it. This is all done so they will leave him alone, but Diane thought he was serious and says to Sam, "See?"
